skill_constraints: Single point of failure on security expertise and QA automation.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior developer availability for security reviews and complex tasks.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize security reviews; aggressive pair programming.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for new Mid-level Backend Developer.
resource_bottlenecks: QA Engineer becomes the primary bottleneck.
mitigation_strategies: Add one Mid-level Backend Developer. Developers take on more integration testing responsibilities.
